resources.string: RockStar will give You more experience to play hard Power-chords , fast arpegio and taping for two hands, like a real rock guitarist .Use a program like trainer and practice your individual technics. RockStar designed to simulate real electric-guitar. All sound loops were recorded from real Ibanez RG,with Elixir strings 10-52.RockStar-Be a Star!
Changing this value allow you to configure number of bar\'s what you can see on your display.
This setting allow you to configure how many sound channels can play in one time.
